JulixHost formally eCoin VPS was established in 2019 with just a little more than two thousand clients and at the moment our client base keeps growing rapidly with more than 5,000 active users Worldwide.

We have built our business on quality, affordability, speed and performance as our servers are powered by KVM virtualization technology, latest Intel Xeon and AMD EPYC processors, NVMe SSD datacenter edition, DDR4 ECC RAM with up to 2Gbps connection delivered from both our US and EU data centers.

JulixHost empowers individuals and businesses to deploy ultra fast VPS and RDP servers within seconds.
